name: Free Online Color Contrast Checker (WCAG) - ATools
description: Free online color contrast checker for WCAG 2.1 AA/AAA with pass/fail results, suggestions, and simple color-blind simulation. Runs locally.
seoDescription: Free online color contrast checker that calculates the WCAG contrast ratio for foreground/background colors and shows AA/AAA pass/fail for normal and large text. Includes simple color-blind simulation preview and black/white foreground suggestions. Runs locally with zero uploads.

ui.hint: Check WCAG contrast ratio for foreground/background colors (local only, no uploads).
